page.topic: How to Filter a Grid on the Selected Rows in a List Control
page.description: Argument arrays, combined with the SQL IN clause, are a powerful way to filter records shown in a Grid component.
page.discussion: A List Control with multi-select enabled can be used to filter a Grid component. Grid filters can include an IN clause. Using the special "array_" prefix, you can specify an array argument that can be used in a Grid filter with the IN clause. For example:

section.description: An array argument prefixed with "array_" must be populated with a [crlf()] delimited list of values.
section.note: When using an array argument in a SQL filter with the IN clause, you must enclose the argument in parentheses.
